subject: Programming Language
title: JavaScript
description: JavaScript is a versatile, high-level programming language primarily known for enhancing web pages to provide interactive content.

subject: Programming Language
title: Python
description: Python is a high-level, interpreted language known for its readability and versatility, widely used in web development, data analysis, and automation.

subject: Programming Language
title: Java
description: Java is a class-based, object-oriented programming language designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.

subject: Programming Language
title: PHP
description: PHP is a popular general-purpose scripting language especially suited to web development, fast, flexible, and pragmatic.

subject: Programming Language
title: C++
description: C++ is a general-purpose programming language created as an extension of the C programming language, known for its performance and efficiency.

subject: Programming Language
title: C#
description: C# is a modern, object-oriented, and type-safe programming language, developed by Microsoft for building a wide range of applications.

subject: Programming Language
title: TypeScript
description: TypeScript is a strongly typed programming language that builds on JavaScript, giving you better tooling at any scale.

subject: Programming Language
title: HTML
description: HTML is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser.

subject: Programming Language
title: CSS
description: CSS is a style sheet language used for describing the presentation of a document written in HTML or XML.

subject: Programming Language
title: Ruby
description: Ruby is an interpreted, high-level, general-purpose programming language designed for simplicity and productivity.

subject: Virtual Reality Component
title: Tracking
description: Tracking systems in VR capture the user's physical movements and translate them into the virtual environment, ensuring accurate representation of actions. Techniques include goniometry for measuring joint angles, fiducial markers resembling QR codes for spatial positioning, and Simultaneous Localization and Mapping (SLAM) for real-time mapping and tracking of the user's location within an unknown environment.

subject: Virtual Reality Component
title: Rendering
description: Rendering in VR involves generating the visual output based on the user's head position and orientation, producing images that align with their perspective. This process utilizes the standard computer graphics pipeline, incorporating shape information, colors, lighting, and textures to create realistic and immersive visuals.

subject: Virtual Reality Component
title: Display
description: The display component presents the rendered images to the user through devices like head-mounted displays (HMDs). These systems employ lenses and image planes to focus and direct light appropriately. Addressing optical issues such as chromatic aberrations is essential to ensure clear and accurate visuals, enhancing the overall immersive experience.

subject: Markdown Feature
title: Headings
description:
# Heading Level 1
## Heading Level 2
### Heading Level 3
#### Heading Level 4
##### Heading Level 5
###### Heading Level 6

subject: Markdown Feature
title: Emphasis
description:
To *italicize* text, wrap it with single asterisks or underscores.
To **bold** text, wrap it with double asterisks or underscores.
Combine them for ***bold italics***.

subject: Markdown Feature
title: Lists
description:
Unordered lists:
- Item 1
- Item 2
  - Subitem 2.1
  - Subitem 2.2

Ordered lists:
1. First item
2. Second item
   1. Subitem 2.1
   2. Subitem 2.2

subject: Markdown Feature
title: Links
description:
Inline-style link: [OpenAI](https://www.openai.com/)
Reference-style link: [OpenAI][1]

[1]: https://www.openai.com/

subject: Markdown Feature
title: Images
description:
Inline-style image:
![Alt text](https://assets.tina.io/527417f4-1e11-49fc-b76f-472a04087e96/logo.gif)

subject: Markdown Feature
title: Blockquotes
description:
> This is a blockquote.
>
> Blockquotes can span multiple lines or paragraphs.

subject: Markdown Feature
title: Code
description:
Inline code: `print('Hello, World!')`

Block code:
```
def hello_world():
    print('Hello, World!')
```

subject: Markdown Feature
title: Horizontal Rules
description:
Three or more hyphens, asterisks, or underscores on a line create a horizontal rule:

---

***

___

subject: Markdown Feature
title: Tables
description:
| Header 1 | Header 2 | Header 3 |
|----------|----------|----------|
| Row 1    | Data     | Here     |
| Row 2    | Data     | Here     |

subject: Markdown Feature
title: Task Lists
description:
- [x] Completed task
- [ ] Incomplete task
